translations: 苦干者，劳碌者（toiler 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Tillers and toilers, bound to the land.
sentences.translation: 农夫和苦工，与土地密不可分。

sentences.sentence: He had had no thought of fame while composing "The Toilers".
sentences.translation: 他写《劳动者》的时候，可没有想到要成名呀。

sentences.sentence: On one extreme, we have toilers who feed the beast on a daily basis, always on the edge of burn-out;
sentences.translation: 说地极端一点，有一些记者以跑腿干苦力的方式来满足“报业巨兽“每日的出版需求，他们通常都处于精力交瘁的边缘；
